14 class OccupancyMap {
15  public:
16  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
17 
18  typedef std::shared_ptr<OccupancyMap> Ptr;
19 
20  struct Config {
21  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
22 
23  FloatingPoint occupancy_voxel_size = 0.2;
24  size_t occupancy_voxels_per_side = 16u;
25  };
26 
27  explicit OccupancyMap(const Config& config)
28  : occupancy_layer_(new Layer<OccupancyVoxel>(
29  config.occupancy_voxel_size, config.occupancy_voxels_per_side)) {
30  block_size_ =
31  config.occupancy_voxel_size * config.occupancy_voxels_per_side;
32  }
33 
34  // Creates a new OccupancyMap based on a COPY of this layer.
35  explicit OccupancyMap(const Layer<OccupancyVoxel>& layer)
36  : OccupancyMap(aligned_shared<Layer<OccupancyVoxel>>(layer)) {}
37 
38  // Creates a new OccupancyMap that contains this layer.
39  explicit OccupancyMap(Layer<OccupancyVoxel>::Ptr layer)
40  : occupancy_layer_(layer) {
41  CHECK(layer);
42  block_size_ = layer->block_size();
43  }
44 
45  virtual ~OccupancyMap() {}
46 
47  Layer<OccupancyVoxel>* getOccupancyLayerPtr() {
48  return occupancy_layer_.get();
49  }
50  const Layer<OccupancyVoxel>& getOccupancyLayer() const {
51  return *occupancy_layer_;
52  }
53 
54  FloatingPoint block_size() const { return block_size_; }
55 
56  protected:
57  FloatingPoint block_size_;
58 
59  // The layers.
60  Layer<OccupancyVoxel>::Ptr occupancy_layer_;
61 };
